name: **Illaunnanoon**
description: Illaunnanoon V607-593 Sheet 83 / Sheet 84 Satellite to the WSW of Illaunacummig. By far the nicest of all the White Strand islands. Only partially given to brambles and gorse. Although the rest is long grass, the camping would definitely attract. There is the distinct feel of island and of remoteness. Angling would be attractive off the S side. Purple Loose Strife abound, as well as sallies. Land in a cut at NE.
